main_features.name: Web Scraping Engine
main_features.description: Scrapes the EU's index of calls for proposals, extracts details, and validates URLs.

main_features.name: Database Management
main_features.description: Manages a PostgreSQL database to store call data and handles CRUD operations.

main_features.name: API Endpoint for Retrieval
main_features.description: Provides an API endpoint to retrieve call data in JSON format.

main_features.name: Dashboard
main_features.description: Displays real-time system status, scraping statistics, and analyzed call results with pagination.

corrective_actions.error_description: Validation Error: ImportError: cannot import name 'CallCreate' from 'app.schemas'
corrective_actions.action: Ensure that the `schemas.py` file exists and contains the correct definitions for `CallCreate` and `CallUpdate`. Verify imports in `tasks.py`.
